title: My Companion!
detail_text: <:th_ch0203/>....And so, I think Ophelia has a touch of intelligence in her voice. She also shows some thoughtfulness.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Wow~, that’s amazing. As for Shiitake.... She barks a lot when she wants food....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>It’s impressive how she can tell you when she wants food. Ophelia sounds smart even by her name alone.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Fufu! Your pet, Alan, also has a wonderful name, Rina-san.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>It’s a very city-like name for a pet~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Ehehe. Alan is also a very smart and cute girl. But it must be nice to have fluffy pets who let you cuddle them like Ophelia and Shiitake.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Shiitake is very gentle and stays put no matter how much you cuddle her. Ophelia gets excited so easily....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Ahaha! Shiitake always goes *wham* on me~. Whenever I’m tired of doing homework, she lets me cuddle her up.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Maybe I should put a fluffy module on Alan too....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Waaah! Let me cuddle her then, okay!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
